name: 3H-perfluoro-3-[(3-methoxy-propoxy) propanoic acid], ammonium salt
Restrictions: Only to be used in the polymerisation of fluoropolymers when: (1.) processed at temperatures higher than 280 °C for at least 10 minutes, (2.) processed at temperatures higher than 190 °C up to 30 % w/w for use in blends with polyoxymethylene polymers and intended for repeated use articles.
